title: [Insurance Claim Update]: IPFS #QmVHA3v
body:
[Update]:
PAID Network team has made an announcement of sending the v2 PAID tokens to all the holders. I.e. most probably they would revert holdings of the wallets back in time and you will be receiving new PAID tokens to the wallet of the requester soon. 

In order to proceed with this claim, v2 PAID tokens will have to be transferred to inSure Platform as well. If airdrop will be deposited to inSure Platform’s account instead of the requester's wallet, the policyholder doesn’t have to do anything.

If the policyholder receives the v2 PAID tokens and decides to keep them, the insurance claim will be disapproved since it won't meet the drastic devaluation claim's requirements.
author: 0x4a30e80E9111CDacE350Fa72D011967ba9514b6B
